1. Download the GoogleMobileAdsSdkiOS-6.12.0 library here: https://developers.google.com/mobile-ads-sdk/download
2. For instructions on how to set it up, see here: https://developers.google.com/mobile-ads-sdk/docs/admob/ios/quick-start
3. Extract its contents to the 3rdparty\GoogleMobileAdsSdkiOS-6.12.0 directory
